ValidationRule.description: Update to Locked Timesheet Entries is not allowed post Lockout time
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(Diab_IsLocked_Adjuster_Approver__c = true , OR(ISCHANGED(AppName__c), ISCHANGED(Approver__c), ISCHANGED(Area_Serv_Terr__c), ISCHANGED(AttendanceType__c), ISCHANGED(CatsHours__c), ISCHANGED(City__c), ISCHANGED(CostCenter__c),
ISCHANGED(HourPer__c), ISCHANGED(IsOvertime__c), ISCHANGED(ISStraightTime__c), ISCHANGED(LocalDateTime_del__c), ISCHANGED(LockoutDate__c), ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED(PersonnelNumber__c), ISCHANGED(Rate__c), ISCHANGED(Reason__c), ISCHANGED(ShortText__c), ISCHANGED(State__c), ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISCHANGED(Timesheet__c), ISCHANGED(ValuationBasis__c), ISCHANGED(WageType__c), ISCHANGED(WBSElement__c), ISCHANGED(WBSElementID__c), ISCHANGED(WeekEnding_Date__c), ISCHANGED(WorkDate__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Timesheet Entry is locked. You can not make any changes. Please contact administrator for further assistance.
